definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: : Ex 16:13 quail (prob, foreign word; Ar. salway, Syr. salway, Sam. slwy);—quail, coturnix communis vel vulguris (Tristr:NHB 229 ff. FFP 124 Post:Hast. DB. QUAIL, Di:Ex 16:13):—abs. coll. Nu 11:32 (J), Ex 16:13 (P), Ps 105:40 (in all Qr [[שְׂלָיו]]); pl. [[שַׂלְוִים]] Nu 11:31 (J; as if from sg. [[שַׂלְוֶה]]).
